original_title: Former Mayor Eric Adams aide accused of giving reporter cash in chip bag | Fox News
article_summary: New York City reporter allegedly offered bribe by former Eric Adams aide Winnie Greco, who is seeking reelection as mayor. Greco reportedly attempted to give a bag of chips containing cash to a reporter from THE CITY, which was later revealed to contain $100 and $20 bills. Greco's attorney claims it was a Chinese custom of showing gratitude and friendship, but the incident has led to an investigation and the Adams campaign prohibiting Greco from participating in volunteer activities.</s>
